mapper.update:
update ehr_person_history
organization_detail_history_id = #{organizationDetailHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
person_code = #{personCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
person_name = #{personName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where person_history_id = #{personHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ehr_person_history( organization_detail_history_id, organization_id, person_id, person_code, person_name )SELECT #{organizationDetailHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, organization_id, person_id, job_number, employee_name FROM ehr_person WHERE organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND left_date IS NULL
